Title: Relates to authorizing Bible literacy courses in public schools
Summary: Relates to authorizing Bible literacy courses in public schools; directs the commissioner to promulgate regulations establishing an elective course of studies in Hebrew scriptures and the New Testament of the Bible to teach students knowledge of biblical content, characters, poetry, and narratives that are prerequisites to understanding contemporary society and culture, including literature, art, music, mores, oratory, and public policy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to Bible literacy courses in public schools
